casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Alan KELLER 201A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2019 Emily H. Davis, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Keller, David Alan.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of July 2019 by Defendant:

*217"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of July 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 26th day of August 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
